name: Tale of Ren: Searching for Heart Droplets
storyline:
In the Realm of REN, all youngsters who have reached the age of 16
must be sent on a journey to find the steam of mind.
I'm Mizu Ren Nanami. . . .
As people of REN, it's time to go on a mission to conquer the hearts of people in other realms.
Then, Rostania is the place I was chosen to come here.
The boys and girls in this school are the ultimate goal that I must strive to weave the threads of relationships until I can capture the essence of the heart's water droplets. However, while carrying out the mission entrusted to me, I discovered a secret that I never knew before, which is related to events in the past.
